Collection of GL extension that are unavailable in neither GLES2/gl2ext.h nor GL/glext.h.
They usually appear in the log terminal like this
mutGLInit() : Found unwrangled extension: GL_EXT_Cg_shader mutGLInit() : Found unwrangled extension: GL_EXTX_framebuffer_mixed_formats mutGLInit() : Found unwrangled extension: GL_EXT_texture_compression_dxt1 mutGLInit() : Found unwrangled extension: GL_EXT_texture_edge_clamp mutGLInit() : Found unwrangled extension: GL_EXT_texture_lod mutGLInit() : Found unwrangled extension: GL_EXT_texture_storage mutGLInit() : Found unwrangled extension: GL_EXT_import_sync_object mutGLInit() : Found unwrangled extension: GL_KTX_buffer_region mutGLInit() : Found unwrangled extension: GL_NV_ES1_1_compatibility
I manually gather these missing extensions in this file to the best of my knowledge, but these extensions are most likely untested and might not even work. Use at your own risk!
